<div id="postcontent-wrapper">

Broken is a musical adapted by the Christian pop  artist Callann Lane, scheduled to be broadcast on the TBN network in mid-2011.

Broken came to Fezziwig with  just a logo, and wanted a polished, slick looking site that would help  sell the DVD and soundtrack CD of the musical.

Fezziwig created a  Genesis Framework child theme based on Amped, customized to match the Broken  logo's color scheme.

</div>

Music Geek Services is an artist services firm based out of Nashville and Chicago, dedicated to the music industry.  

Fezziwig was asked to update the logo and create a WordPress theme for the new MGS web site.

Fezziwig and Music Geek Services chose to achieve the resulting web site by highly customizing a Genesis Framework child theme.

<div id="postcontent-wrapper">

Fezziwig has been working with author and speaker Dean Sluyter since nearly the dawn of the World Wide Web.

Our first site for Dean dates back to 1996, when his first book, Why The Chicken Crossed The Road, was published.

Originally written in ColdFusion using a custom CMS, Dean's site has gone through several iterations.  Its current version was developed from scratch in Drupal.

</div>
[Jun 1, 2011, 12:53PM-all] Not serialized EDITED data: <div id="postgallery-wrapper">[nggallery id=6]</div>
<div id="postcontent-wrapper">

Fezziwig has been working with author and speaker Dean Sluyter since nearly the dawn of the World Wide Web.

Our first site for Dean dates back to 1996, when his first book, Why The Chicken Crossed The Road, was published.

Originally written in ColdFusion using a custom CMS, Dean's site has gone through several iterations.  Its current version was developed from scratch in Drupal.

</div>

Broken is a musical adapted by the Christian pop  artist Callann Lane, scheduled to be broadcast on the TBN network in mid-2011.

Broken came to Fezziwig with  just a logo, and wanted a polished, slick looking site that would help  sell the DVD and soundtrack CD of the musical.

Fezziwig created a  Genesis Framework child theme based on Amped, customized to match the Broken  logo's color scheme.

</div>

Broken is a musical adapted by the Christian pop  artist Callann Lane, scheduled to be broadcast on the TBN network in mid-2011.

Broken came to Fezziwig with  just a logo, and wanted a polished, slick looking site that would help  sell the DVD and soundtrack CD of the musical.

Fezziwig created a  Genesis Framework child theme based on Amped, customized to match the Broken  logo's color scheme.

<div id="postcontent-wrapper">

Oikocredit Northwest is a local support organization for Oikocredit UA, an international development cooperative that empowers poor and marginalized people around the world with credit. 

Fezziwig has been working with Oikocredit Northwest to establish a web presence, complete with graphic design, Drupal web development, and development of a CiviCRM-based database of members and contacts.  

</div>

<div id="postcontent-wrapper">

Oikocredit Northwest is a local support organization for Oikocredit UA, an international development cooperative that empowers poor and marginalized people around the world with credit. 

Fezziwig has been working with Oikocredit Northwest to establish a web presence, complete with graphic design, Drupal web development, and development of a CiviCRM-based database of members and contacts.  

Please visit the site at http://oikocreditnorthwest.org, or click on the images at right to view enlarged screen shots.

</div>

<div id="postcontent-wrapper">

Oikocredit Northwest is a local support organization for Oikocredit UA, an international development cooperative that empowers poor and marginalized people around the world with credit. 

Fezziwig has been working with Oikocredit Northwest to establish a web presence, complete with graphic design, Drupal web development, and development of a CiviCRM-based database of members and contacts.  

Please visit the site at http://oikocreditnorthwest.org, or click on the images at right to view enlarged screen shots.

</div>

<div id="postcontent-wrapper">

Broken is a musical adapted by the Christian pop  artist Callann Lane, scheduled to be broadcast on the TBN network in mid-2011.

Broken came to Fezziwig with  just a logo, and wanted a polished, slick looking site that would help  sell the DVD and soundtrack CD of the musical.

Fezziwig created a  Genesis Framework child theme based on Amped, customized to match the Broken  logo's color scheme.

</div>

Music Geek Services is an artist services firm based out of Nashville and Chicago, dedicated to the music industry.  

Fezziwig was asked to update the logo and create a WordPress theme for the new MGS web site.

Fezziwig and Music Geek Services chose to achieve the resulting web site by highly customizing a Genesis Framework child theme.

<div id="postcontent-wrapper">

Fezziwig has been working with author and speaker Dean Sluyter since nearly the dawn of the World Wide Web.

Our first site for Dean dates back to 1996, when his first book, Why The Chicken Crossed The Road, was published.

Originally written in ColdFusion using a custom CMS, Dean's site has gone through several iterations.  Its current version was developed from scratch in Drupal.

</div>
[Jun 1, 2011, 12:53PM-all] Not serialized EDITED data: <div id="postgallery-wrapper">[nggallery id=6]</div>
<div id="postcontent-wrapper">

Fezziwig has been working with author and speaker Dean Sluyter since nearly the dawn of the World Wide Web.

Our first site for Dean dates back to 1996, when his first book, Why The Chicken Crossed The Road, was published.

Originally written in ColdFusion using a custom CMS, Dean's site has gone through several iterations.  Its current version was developed from scratch in Drupal.

</div>

<div id="postcontent-wrapper">

The Society for Commercial Archeology is an international membership organization, dedicated to the interpretation and preservation of the 20th century commercial roadside landscape.

Fezziwig's work for the SCA consists of Drupal-based web design and development, including a CiviCRM-based membership management component.

Please visit the site at <a href="http://sca-roadside.org" target="_blank">sca-roadside.org</a>, or click on the images at right to view enlarged screen shots.

</div>

<div id="postcontent-wrapper">

Oikocredit Northwest is a local support organization for Oikocredit UA, an international development cooperative that empowers poor and marginalized people around the world with credit.

Fezziwig has been working with Oikocredit Northwest to establish a web presence, complete with graphic design, Drupal web development, and development of a CiviCRM-based database of members and contacts.

Please visit the site at <a href="http://sca-roadside.org" target="_blank">oikocreditnorthwest.org</a>, or click on the images at right to view enlarged screen shots.

</div>

<div id="postcontent-wrapper">

The Society for Commercial Archeology is an international membership organization, dedicated to the interpretation and preservation of the 20th century commercial roadside landscape.

Fezziwig's work for the SCA c Drupal-based web design and development, including a CiviCRM-based membership management component

Please visit the site at <a href="http://sca-roadside.org" target="_blank">sca-roadside.org</a>, or click on the images at right to view enlarged screen shots.

</div>

[Jun 1, 2011, 12:53PM-all] Not serialized ORIGINAL data: <div id="postgallery-wrapper">[nggallery id=10]</div>
<div id="postcontent-wrapper">

Oikocredit Northwest is a local support organization for Oikocredit UA, an international development cooperative that empowers poor and marginalized people around the world with credit.

Fezziwig has been working with Oikocredit Northwest to establish a web presence, complete with graphic design, Drupal web development, and development of a CiviCRM-based database of members and contacts.

Please visit the site at <a href="http://sca-roadside.org" target="_blank">oikocreditnorthwest.org</a>, or click on the images at right to view enlarged screen shots.

</div>
[Jun 1, 2011, 12:53PM-all] Not serialized EDITED data: <div id="postgallery-wrapper">[nggallery id=10]</div>
<div id="postcontent-wrapper">

Oikocredit Northwest is a local support organization for Oikocredit UA, an international development cooperative that empowers poor and marginalized people around the world with credit.

Fezziwig has been working with Oikocredit Northwest to establish a web presence, complete with graphic design, Drupal web development, and development of a CiviCRM-based database of members and contacts.

Please visit the site at <a href="http://sca-roadside.org" target="_blank">oikocreditnorthwest.org</a>, or click on the images at right to view enlarged screen shots.

</div>

[Jun 1, 2011, 12:53PM-all] Not serialized ORIGINAL data: Fezziwig Web Works are two, sometimes more, folks from Seattle, Chicago, and occasionally Nashville and elsewhere.

We have been building web sites both together and apart for the past 15 years -- since nearly the dawn of Internet time!

Building sites in WordPress and Drupal, as well as old school, hand-crafted sites using PHP and ColdFusion, we can put together a team that is perfectly suited to any web project, at any level of sophistication.

We are always looking for new opportunities to put out talents to work on sophisticated web sites, and we look forward to discussing your current web needs and how we can help you achieve them.

Please take the time to fill out our <a title="Contact Us" href="http://fezziwigwebworks.osmarea.com/?page_id=50">contact form</a>, so that we may be in touch!
[Jun 1, 2011, 12:53PM-all] Not serialized EDITED data: Fezziwig Web Works are two, sometimes more, folks from Seattle, Chicago, and occasionally Nashville and elsewhere.

We have been building web sites both together and apart for the past 15 years -- since nearly the dawn of Internet time!

Building sites in WordPress and Drupal, as well as old school, hand-crafted sites using PHP and ColdFusion, we can put together a team that is perfectly suited to any web project, at any level of sophistication.

We are always looking for new opportunities to put out talents to work on sophisticated web sites, and we look forward to discussing your current web needs and how we can help you achieve them.

Please take the time to fill out our <a title="Contact Us" href="http://fezziwigwebworks.com/?page_id=50">contact form</a>, so that we may be in touch!

[Jun 1, 2011, 12:53PM-all] Not serialized ORIGINAL data: Fezziwig Web Works are two, sometimes more, folks from Seattle, Chicago, and occasionally Austin and elsewhere.

We have been building web sites both together and apart for the past 15 years -- since nearly the dawn of Internet time!

Building sites in WordPress and Drupal , and old school hand-crafted sites using tools ranging from ColdFusion to PHP, we can put together a team that is perfectly suited to any web project, at any level of sophistication.

We are always looking for new opportunities to put out talents to work on sophisticated web sites, and we look forward to discussing your current web needs and how we can help you achieve them.

Please take the time to fill out our <a title="Contact Us" href="http://fezziwigwebworks.osmarea.com/?page_id=50">contact form</a>, so that we may be in touch!

We have been building web sites both together and apart for the past 15 years, since nearly the dawn of Internet time!

[Jun 1, 2011, 12:53PM-all] Not serialized ORIGINAL data: Fezziwig Web Works are two, sometimes more, folks from Seattle, Chicago, and occasionally Austin and elsewhere.

We have been building web sites both together and apart for the past 15 years -- since nearly the dawn of Internet time!

Building sites in WordPress and Drupal, as well as old school, hand-crafted sites using PHP and ColdFusion, we can put together a team that is perfectly suited to any web project, at any level of sophistication.

We are always looking for new opportunities to put out talents to work on sophisticated web sites, and we look forward to discussing your current web needs and how we can help you achieve them.

Please take the time to fill out our <a title="Contact Us" href="http://fezziwigwebworks.osmarea.com/?page_id=50">contact form</a>, so that we may be in touch!
